title: Democrats Ask SEC to Explain Lack of Enforcement on Trump-Linked Crypto Entities
full_text: Democrats Ask SEC to Explain Lack of Enforcement on Trump-Linked Crypto Entities. “Given the industry’s history of investor-harm... this turn raises troubling questions about the SEC’s priorities and effectiveness.". Three Democrats on the House Financial Services Committee have published an open letter to Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) Chairman Paul Atkins regarding the lack of crypto enforcement actio… [+4534 chars]
